== Marancheri (CT) (627565) ==

Marancheri (CT) is a town in the [[Ponnani]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 20.4 sq. km. and harbouring 7104 households with total population of 35011 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 65 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 340 km. Male population is 16041 and female population is 18970. Scheduled Caste population is 1361 and Scheduled Tribes population is 75. Census Location Code of the town is 627565<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 65 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 50 km. Railway station is at Kuttippuram at a distance of 10 km.
